forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 11C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 51F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early then periods of showers late. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers after midnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low around 40F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. High near 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening with scattered thunderstorms arriving overnight. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with scattered thunderstorms arriving overnight. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low near 5C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 41F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
